revised_title: Chemical Composition of Vegetable Seed Fats and Their Relation to Plant Orders
tldr: The author analyzes the chemical composition of vegetable seed fats in relation to the natural orders of plants. They found that seed fats from plants belonging to the same or similar botanical orders often contain similar and specific mixtures of fatty acids. The study focuses on four botanical orders: Palmaceae, Myristicaceae, Cruciferae, and Umbelliferae, and their unique fatty acid compositions.
